name: compose-for-agents (docker)
description: [项目级] Build and run AI agents using Docker Compose. A collection of ready-to-use examples for orchestrating open-source LLMs, tools, and agent runtimes.。来源: https://github.com/docker/compose-for-agents

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Build and run AI agents using Docker Compose. A collection of ready-to-use examples for orchestrating open-source LLMs, tools, and agent runtimes.

来源: https://github.com/docker/compose-for-agents
语言: TypeScript
Stars: 843
